update cargo_charge
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cargo_fee = #{cargoFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cargo_charge set expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cargo_fee = #{cargoFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
